result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isa Marie Pena Marrero

defendant.name: Marrero, Isa Marie Pena
defendant.address: 5480 Blackberry Trail, Inver Grove Heights, MN 55076

records.addlTxt:
DENIED - Incomplete application. Must fill out section 3 and disclose income. Signed by RMW on 10/5/22. kma

Clerk contacted DE by phone to inform her of the denial and that she would need to complete the information requested by Judge Waterman before petition can be considered. DE stated that she would come in to complete PFAC. kma
on Petition for Appointment of an Attorney. Unsigned. kma    to RMW

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Filed by DA Office Selena P. arc

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, A.M.M.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant. 

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:44 PM CO: RMW, REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Jeremiah Harrelson in court for Defendant for today. Defendant Isa Marie Pena Marrero appeared by video, in custody. DE updates address. DE understands charges and possible penalties. Waive reading. Atty Harrelson didn't get a chance to qualify DE- DE to contact PD to see if she qualifies for PD services. Bond argument. Court orders bond. NG. Reserve on pre-plea rights. Court sets PSC.  gll
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
